text: "Wind of Change" is a 1990 hard rock pop ballad song by the Scorpions. The song is about the ending of the Cold War and hope when tense conditions came up. The song was released in January 1991. It became a worldwide hit single during 1991. The song has sold millions of copies worldwide since then. It hit #4 on the American Billboard Hot 100. notable soundtrack includes is featured in the films or television The Powerpuff Girls Movie unused trailer, Godzilla vs. Kong fan-fiction dub version, Nutri Ventures as a international dub parody version. There is also a Russian language version of the song. ==References== Category:1990s ballads Category:1990 songs Category:Cold War Category:Rock ballads Category:Scorpions (band) songs
title: Wind of Change (Scorpions song)
